original_text: The priest must look at the person. The mark might be bigger. The priest must say that the person has a disease. It is a disease that he could give to other people.
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 그 병이 피부에 퍼졌으면 그를 부정하다 할지니라 이는 나병임이니라

sentences.original_text: The priest must look at the person

sentences.korean_translation: 그 흔적이 더 커질 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: The priest must say that the person has a disease
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그 사람이 질병이 있다고 말해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: It is a disease that he could give to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 사람들에게 전파될 수 있는 질병입니다
